name: Infernal Cave
description:
A 2D dot action game with a nostalgic look!
Just operate the character and aim for the goal of each stage... However, each stage is full of various traps and gimmicks that aim at your life.
The strategy tip is to memorize the gimmick with your own body! ?
Now, will you be able to conquer this "Infernal cave"?

  • Single-player

How to play
←→AD: Move
Space key: jump
Esc: Pause
The menu screen is operated by mouse.
If you make a mistake, you will automatically be retried, but you can quickly retry by pressing the "R" key.
